name: 丧尸世界-送150连抽
description:
[Place the battle without operation] Recruit survivors, and the strongest survival team will defend the homeland! You can also get benefits offline, and the best equipment will not be missed!

[Team cultivation, changeable strategies] Hundreds of partners are available for you to choose. Diversified cultivation helps protect your survival journey!

[Super multi content play method, against single level] The only way to survive in the end is to explore the level! Honeycomb, Raccoon Breakthrough, Waste Land Adventure and other wonderful content are waiting for you to experience!

[No brothers, no fighting] Team up in the arena, and only the strongest can lead the partners to survive!
publishers: 异能觉醒，征战废土世界
